## FieldImage class

Class for an image on a block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FieldImage extends Field<string> 
```
**Extends:** [Field](./blockly.field.md)<!-- -->&lt;string&gt;

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(src, width, height, alt, onClick, flipRtl, config)](./blockly.fieldimage._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>FieldImage</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [EDITABLE](./blockly.fieldimage.editable.md) | <code>readonly</code> | (not declared) | Editable fields usually show some sort of UI indicating they are editable. This field should not. |
|  [imageElement](./blockly.fieldimage.imageelement.md) | <code>protected</code> | SVGImageElement \| null | The rendered field's image element. |
|  [imageHeight](./blockly.fieldimage.imageheight.md) | <p><code>protected</code></p><p><code>readonly</code></p> | number |  |
|  [isDirty\_](./blockly.fieldimage.isdirty_.md) | <code>protected</code> | boolean | Used to tell if the field needs to be rendered the next time the block is rendered. Image fields are statically sized, and only need to be rendered at initialization. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [configure\_(config)](./blockly.fieldimage.configure_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Configure the field based on the given map of options. |
|  [doClassValidation\_(newValue)](./blockly.fieldimage.doclassvalidation_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Ensure that the input value (the source URL) is a string. |
|  [doValueUpdate\_(newValue)](./blockly.fieldimage.dovalueupdate_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Update the value of this image field, and update the displayed image. |
|  [getFlipRtl()](./blockly.fieldimage.getfliprtl.md) |  | Get whether to flip this image in RTL |
|  [getText\_()](./blockly.fieldimage.gettext_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Use the <code>getText_</code> developer hook to override the field's text representation. Return the image alt text instead. |
|  [initView()](./blockly.fieldimage.initview.md) |  | Create the block UI for this image. |
|  [setAlt(alt)](./blockly.fieldimage.setalt.md) |  | Set the alt text of this image. |
|  [setOnClickHandler(func)](./blockly.fieldimage.setonclickhandler.md) |  | Set the function that is called when this image is clicked. |
|  [showEditor\_()](./blockly.fieldimage.showeditor_.md) | <code>protected</code> | If field click is called, and click handler defined, call the handler. |
